descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This is a replacer of Odahviing by a request. At first I tried to make it as .esp but that was hard and confusing so I renamed Imprefvicticious Alduin's textures and meshes with Odahviing's and there you go.

[/size][size=3]This is only a mesh and texture replacer. It will not change Odahviing's actions in anyway possible, he's still quiet a bro :)[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color]

[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]You need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59875/?][color=#3d85c6]Imprefvicticious Ald[/color][/url][/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59875/?][color=#3d85c6]uin[/color][/url][color=#3d85c6] [/color]installed first. Then you can automatically with manager or you know what to do.[/size]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]What will happen if I don't have Alduin installed?[/size]
[size=5]A: [/size][size=3]Odahviing will look pure red.[/size]
[size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]Why is it must?[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] Mesh requires alduin.dds and such, that's why. Could've done w/o it too of course, but meh.[/size]

[size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]Does the name have a meaning for this one?
[/size][size=5]A:[/size] [size=3]Since you can call Odahviing with a shout, it has.[/size]
[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/XTj8wrZ.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/XLe1Czk.jpg[/img][/size]
[/font][center][i][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]taken with somber 3 ENB[/font][/i][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
